:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: questions 

- How does copyright law affect
the use of multidimensional dataset?

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: objectives
- To understand copyright law in the UK.
- To be aware of the impact of the 
copyright legislation on personal
practice for collecting 
multidimensional data.
- Demonstrate that this understanding
can be applied on a dataset.



::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

that has been gathered from a mixture of
